Package gears.sidescroller.world.core

Class MobileWorldObject

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.core.WorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.core.MobileWorldObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable, Collidable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractEntity
public abstract class MobileWorldObject extends WorldObject
The MobileWorldObject class adds support for changing the coordinates of an ObjectInWorld. I may need to change this class in the future to support classes such as mobile machines.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(int fps)
      Moves this object. Subclasses should override this method and call super.update if they need special behavior.
      Specified by:
      update in class WorldObject
      Parameters:
      fps - the frame rate

    • move

      public abstract void move(int fps)
      updates the coordinates of this object
      Parameters:
      fps - the approximate number of frames since the last call to move. Subclasses should scale their movement based upon this parameter.
